org.openimaj.ml.linear.learner

Class BilinearLearnerParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<String,Object>
        • org.openimaj.ml.linear.learner.LearningParameters
          • org.openimaj.ml.linear.learner.BilinearLearnerParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,Object>, WriteableASCII

    public class BilinearLearnerParameters
extends LearningParameters
implements WriteableASCII
    Parameters used to control a BilinearSparseOnlineLearner
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static String BIAS
      whether a bias component is added to w and u.
      static String BIASINITSTRAT
      The initialisation strategy for BIAS.
      static String BICONVEX_MAXITER
      The maximum number of iterations in the biconvex iterative stage.
      static String BICONVEX_TOL
      The threshold of the ratio between the (sum(new_w - old_w) + sum(new_u - old_u)) / (sum(old_u) + sum(old_w)) i.e.
      static String DAMPENING
      The value of w, u and beta are updated each time data is added s.t.
      static String ETA_GAMMA
      The ammount by which ETA is made to increase each iteration
      static String ETA0_BIAS
      The weighting of the subgradient of BIAS, weighted down each ETASTEPS number of iterations of the biconvex scheme, defaults to eta0 (0.05)
      static String ETA0_U
      The weighting of the subgradient of U, weighted down each ETASTEPS number of iterations of the biconvex scheme, defaults to 0.05
      static String ETA0_W
      The weighting of the subgradient of W, weighted down each ETASTEPS number of iterations of the biconvex scheme, defaults to 0.05
      static String ETASTEPS
      The steps at which point the eta parameter is reduced, defaults to 3
      static String EXPANDEDUINITSTRAT
      The initialisation strategy for U when it is expanded.
      static String EXPANDEDWINITSTRAT
      The initialisation strategy for W when it is expanded.
      static String FORCE_SPARCITY
      Should all parameter matricies be held SparseMatrix instances and therefore remain sparse.
      static String LAMBDA
      The parameter of the regulariser for both W and U
      static String LAMBDA_U
      The parameter of the regulariser for U, defaults to LAMBDA
      static String LAMBDA_W
      The parameter of the regulariser for W, defaults to LAMBDA
      static String LOSS
      The loss function, defaults to SquareMissingLossFunction
      static String REGUL
      The regularisation function, defaults to L1L2Regulariser
      static String SEED
      The random seed of any randomised components of this learner (usually initialisation).
      static String UINITSTRAT
      The initialisation strategy for U.
      static String WINITSTRAT
      The initialisation strategy for W.
      static String Z_STANDARDISE
      Whether the Vprime and Dprime matrices should be zscore standardised

    • Field Detail

      • BIAS

        public static final String BIAS
        whether a bias component is added to w and u. Default is false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEED

        public static final String SEED
        The random seed of any randomised components of this learner (usually initialisation). Defaults to -1 (i.e. no seed)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WINITSTRAT

        public static final String WINITSTRAT
        The initialisation strategy for W. Defaults to a SparseRandomInitStrategy with sparsity set to 0.5
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UINITSTRAT

        public static final String UINITSTRAT
        The initialisation strategy for U. Defaults to a SparseRandomInitStrategy with sparsity set to 0.5
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXPANDEDWINITSTRAT

        public static final String EXPANDEDWINITSTRAT
        The initialisation strategy for W when it is expanded. Defaults to the context aware CurrentWMean
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXPANDEDUINITSTRAT

        public static final String EXPANDEDUINITSTRAT
        The initialisation strategy for U when it is expanded. Defaults to the context aware CurrentUMean
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIASINITSTRAT

        public static final String BIASINITSTRAT
        The initialisation strategy for BIAS. Defaults to a SparseZerosInitStrategy
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BICONVEX_MAXITER

        public static final String BICONVEX_MAXITER
        The maximum number of iterations in the biconvex iterative stage. defaults to 3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BICONVEX_TOL

        public static final String BICONVEX_TOL
        The threshold of the ratio between the (sum(new_w - old_w) + sum(new_u - old_u)) / (sum(old_u) + sum(old_w)) i.e. some notion of normalised changed of the paramters. Defaults to 0.01
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LAMBDA_W

        public static final String LAMBDA_W
        The parameter of the regulariser for W, defaults to LAMBDA
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LAMBDA_U

        public static final String LAMBDA_U
        The parameter of the regulariser for U, defaults to LAMBDA
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LAMBDA

        public static final String LAMBDA
        The parameter of the regulariser for both W and U
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ETA0_U

        public static final String ETA0_U
        The weighting of the subgradient of U, weighted down each ETASTEPS number of iterations of the biconvex scheme, defaults to 0.05
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ETA0_W

        public static final String ETA0_W
        The weighting of the subgradient of W, weighted down each ETASTEPS number of iterations of the biconvex scheme, defaults to 0.05
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ETA0_BIAS

        public static final String ETA0_BIAS
        The weighting of the subgradient of BIAS, weighted down each ETASTEPS number of iterations of the biconvex scheme, defaults to eta0 (0.05)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOSS

        public static final String LOSS
        The loss function, defaults to SquareMissingLossFunction
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REGUL

        public static final String REGUL
        The regularisation function, defaults to L1L2Regulariser
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ETASTEPS

        public static final String ETASTEPS
        The steps at which point the eta parameter is reduced, defaults to 3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FORCE_SPARCITY

        public static final String FORCE_SPARCITY
        Should all parameter matricies be held SparseMatrix instances and therefore remain sparse. Forces a copy but could save a lot.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DAMPENING

        public static final String DAMPENING
        The value of w, u and beta are updated each time data is added s.t. w = w * (1.0 - DAM PENING). The default value is 0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Z_STANDARDISE

        public static final String Z_STANDARDISE
        Whether the Vprime and Dprime matrices should be zscore standardised
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ETA_GAMMA

        public static final String ETA_GAMMA
        The ammount by which ETA is made to increase each iteration
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
